document.docAuthor: Hazzi, Nicolás A., Valderrama-Ardila, Carlos, Brescovit Daniele Polotow, Antonio D. & Simó, Miguel
document.masterDocTitle: New records and geographical distribution of ctenid spiders (Araneae: Ctenidae) in Colombia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New records and geographical distribution of ctenid spiders (Araneae: Ctenidae) in Colombia

caption.paragraph: TABLE 2. Ctenids species present in Colombia in five natural areas. AM: Amazonia, AN: Andean, CA: Caribbean, OR: Orinoquia, PA: Pacific, n: Number of areas where each species was found. (*species without detailed locality information).
